content.p: The University of Nottingham is eligible to certify American Federal Direct Loan applications for students studying at our UK campuses. We provide assistance and guidance to prospective and current students throughout the process. We also support Canadian loan students requiring completion of formal documentation by the University. You may wish to contact Nicola May who is responsible for the administration of American and Canadian loans for study at the University of Nottingham. American student loans and federal aid Government of Canada student loans Please see American student loans and Federal Aid for general information about how the American loan process works at Nottingham, guiding you through the process from application to disbursement. If you are applying for, or in receipt of, a Canadian student loan, please see Government of Canada student loans to find out more. If you have a loan related form requiring completion, please email Federal aid.
